hanzi-su-wiki:
蓄

Значения

Копить, запасать

Мнемоника

Запасать сухую траву 艹 для скота 畜.
purpleculture_pinyin:
xù
to store up; to grow (e.g. a beard); to entertain (ideas)
накапливать; отрастить (например, бороду); развлекать (идеи)
rtega_mnemonic:
蓄蓄RSstore, save, hoard, gather, raise
  • cultivate plants 艹 and livestock 畜
  • store plants 艹 as food for livestock 畜
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 畜 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
储蓄 [ chǔ xù ]: to deposit money; to save; savings
蓄水 [ xù shuǐ ]: water storage
积蓄 [ jī xù ]: to save; to put aside; savings
含蓄 [ hán xù ]: to contain; to hold; (of a person or style etc) reserved; restrained; (of words, writings) full of hidden meaning; implicit; veiled (criticism)
蓄意 [ xù yì ]: deliberate; premeditated; malice
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 畜 [ chù ] livestock, domestic animals
heisig_chinese_memo: A farmer wants to save up (amass) his livestock so he needs to continue to feed them as many flowers as possible. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: amass, flowers, livestock, mysterious, top hat, cocoon, rice field, brains
koohiiStory1: One sneaky farmer wanted to amass a large collection of livestock. We all know that cows like to eat flowers, so he planted lines of flowers leading to his own fields. The livestock followed the lines, eating the flowers one by one, and amassed in his field.
koohiiStory2: Kobe beef. The Japanese amass a fortune pampering livestock feeding them flowers, offering beer, playing music and giving them massages… RTK2:　チク　蓄電池　ちくでんち(battery cell)…　Pure Group:　畜1384.
jp_example_words:
蓄積(ちくせき): accumulation, accumulate, store
貯蓄(ちょちく): savings
蓄える(たくわえる): to store
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Flowers are mysteriously appearing in the rice paddy. No matter what you do to them, they continue to amass.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself spraying poison on these mysterious flowers, but they just double in size, and continue to amass.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As the flowers amass it starts attracting wildlife. Soon thousands of baby chicks (ちく) are amassing in the rice paddy as well.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Feel the wetness of the rice paddy under your feet and the fluffiness of the chicks pressing in on you. Watch the looming, mysterious flowers above you as the chicks smother you.
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 幺 (короткая нить), 艾 (мокса), 玄 (непостижимый), 田 (рисовое поле)
Ru_trainchinese: xù: (глаг) накапливать, запасать; растить (волосы, бороду); предаваться (напр., идее)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you're raising animals (畜) the grass (艹) must be stored
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A farmer wants to save up (amass) his livestock so he needs to continue to feed them as many flowers as possible. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "艸", " Animal ", the original meaning is accumulation and storage. "Shuowen": "Jiye. From the chariot, the sound of the animal." "Poetry‧Beifeng‧Gufeng": "I have a purpose to store, and also to protect against winter."

" Storing " can mean raising and nurturing. "Mandarin-Jin Language Fourth": "You can accumulate energy for a period of time." Wei Zhao's note: "Storage, nourishment."

" Storing " also means waiting. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·The Biography of Zhang Heng": "The distant traces come with flying sounds. What is the storage of time?" Li Xian's note: "It is still waiting.

" Storing " also means keeping (beard, hair). "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 4: "So while still young, he had his hair grown and acted as a gatekeeper."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "艸", " Animal ", the original meaning is accumulation and storage.
humanum_full_description:
從「艸」，「畜」聲，本義為積聚、儲藏。《說文》：「積也。从艸，畜聲。」《詩‧邶風‧谷風》：「我有旨蓄，亦以御冬。」

　　「蓄」可表示蓄養、養育。《國語‧晉語四》：「蓄力一紀，可以遠矣。」韋昭注：「蓄，養也。」

　　「蓄」也表示等待。《後漢書‧張衡傳》：「盍遠跡以飛聲兮，孰謂時之可蓄？」李賢注：「蓄猶待。」

　　「蓄」還表示留着（鬚、髮）。《紅樓夢》第4回：「遂趁年紀尚輕，蓄了髮，充當門子。」
humanum_short_description: 從「艸」，「畜」聲，本義為積聚、儲藏。

從「 艸 」，「 畜 」聲，本義為積聚、儲藏。《說文》：「積也。从艸，畜聲。」《詩‧邶風‧谷風》：「我有旨蓄，亦以御冬。」 「 蓄 」可表示蓄養、養育。《國語‧晉語四》：「蓄力一紀，可以遠矣。」韋昭注：「蓄，養也。」 「 蓄 」也表示等待。《後漢書‧張衡傳》：「盍遠跡以飛聲兮，孰謂時之可蓄？」李賢注：「蓄猶待。」 「 蓄 」還表示留着（鬚、髮）。《紅樓夢》第4回：「遂趁年紀尚輕，蓄了髮，充當門子。」
From the sound of " 艸", " Animal", the original meaning is accumulation and storage. "Shuowen": "Jiye. From the chariot, the sound of the animal." "Poetry‧Beifeng‧Gufeng": "I have a purpose to store, and also to protect against winter." " Storing" can mean raising and nurturing. "Mandarin-Jin Language Fourth": "You can accumulate energy for a period of time." Wei Zhao's note: "Storage, nourishment." " Storing" also means waiting. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·The Biography of Zhang Heng": "The distant traces come with flying sounds. What is the storage of time?" Li Xian's note: "It is still waiting. " Storing" also means keeping (beard, hair). "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 4: "So while still young, he had his hair grown and acted as a gatekeeper."

Basic explanation of words
Accumulate
xù
Accumulate, store, preserve: store. Flood storage. Growth (f?). Stock up. Savings. Savings. Be eclectic.
Stored in the heart: deliberate. Hold grudges. Deliberately. Deliberately. implicit.
Waiting: "Which means the time can be stored?"

Accumulate
Name meaning
Accumulate, store.
xù
I
гл. А
1) запасать, копить; откладывать, приберегать
蓄粮 запасать хлеб (зерно)
2) растить, разводить; держать, содержать; пестовать
蓄丫头 держать служанок-рабынь
蓄花 разводить цветы
3) накоплять, аккумулировать; питать, лелеять (чувства)
蓄力 накоплять (аккумулировать) силы
蓄疑 питать сомнения
гл. Б
1) собираться, накапливаться, скопляться
素蓄 постоянно (издавна) накапливаться
蓄泄 собираться и рассеиваться
2) ждать, медлить
孰谓时之可蓄 кто сказал, что время может ждать?
II сущ.
1) запасы, накопления
国无九年之蓄曰不足 если в стране нет запасов на девять лет, это называется необеспеченностью
2) щавель
III собств.
Сюй (фамилия)
Radicals: 艹, 玄, 田  (flowers, mysterious, rice-paddy)
Meaning Mnemonic
Flowers are mysteriously appearing in the rice paddy. No matter what you do to them, they continue to amass.
Imagine yourself spraying poison on these mysterious flowers, but they just double in size, and continue to amass.
Reading Mnemonic
As the flowers amass it starts attracting wildlife. Soon thousands of baby chicks (ちく) are amassing in the rice paddy as well.
Feel the wetness of the rice paddy under your feet and the fluffiness of the chicks pressing in on you. Watch the looming, mysterious flowers above you as the chicks smother you.
